intro:
The orthodox escape game for you, staged in a resort facility.
Can you solve all the riddles and get out?
description:
■GAME SYSTEM
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and story goes on.

■STORY
You've come to stay at a trending resort hotel
in a southern island.

Enjoying yourself in the great vacation,
The hotel manager talks to you.

He says this place has a fancy escape attraction.

I decide to try it in no time because
part of me wants some excitements in this relaxing stay.
